workflow.name: Xero Overdue Invoice Payment Reminder Workflow

parameters.subject: Payment Reminder - Invoice {{ $json.InvoiceNumber }}

properties.hs_task_body: Customer {{ $json.Contact.Name }} has an overdue invoice ({{ $json.InvoiceNumber }}) for ${{ $json.AmountDue }}. Payment reminder was sent 14 days ago. Please call to discuss payment arrangements.

buildPhases.description: Retrieves overdue invoices from Xero to initiate the payment reminder workflow. This serves as the trigger point for processing unpaid invoices.
Fetches payment history for each overdue invoice to understand the customer's payment behavior and current status.
Evaluates whether the invoice still has an outstanding balance and determines if payment reminder actions should proceed.
Sends polite payment reminder email to customers and notifies the finance team via Slack about overdue invoices requiring attention.
Waits 14 days and then creates a follow-up call task in HubSpot for unpaid invoices to ensure persistent collection efforts.

parameters.content:
## üì• Triggers
Retrieves overdue invoices from Xero to initiate the payment reminder workflow. This serves as the trigger point for processing unpaid invoices.

## üìä Inputs
Fetches payment history for each overdue invoice to understand the customer's payment behavior and current status.

## üîÄ Decision
Evaluates whether the invoice still has an outstanding balance and determines if payment reminder actions should proceed.

## üöÄ Outputs
Sends polite payment reminder email to customers and notifies the finance team via Slack about overdue invoices requiring attention.

## üîó Integration
Waits 14 days and then creates a follow-up call task in HubSpot for unpaid invoices to ensure persistent collection efforts.

## üöÄ Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with üíö by Ghost Team.

Sends polite payment reminder email to customers and notifies the finance team via Slack about overdue invoices requiring attention.
Waits 14 days and then creates a follow-up call task in HubSpot for unpaid invoices to ensure persistent collection efforts.

parameters.content:
## üì• Triggers
Retrieves overdue invoices from Xero to initiate the payment reminder workflow. This serves as the trigger point for processing unpaid invoices.

## üìä Inputs
Fetches payment history for each overdue invoice to understand the customer's payment behavior and current status.

## üîÄ Decision
Evaluates whether the invoice still has an outstanding balance and determines if payment reminder actions should proceed.

## üöÄ Outputs
Sends polite payment reminder email to customers and notifies the finance team via Slack about overdue invoices requiring attention.

## üîó Integration
Waits 14 days and then creates a follow-up call task in HubSpot for unpaid invoices to ensure persistent collection efforts.
